title: Behind Crumbling Walls
body:
fandom: boku no hero academia
characters: bakugou katsuki, todoroki shouto, ashido mina, kirishima eijirou
word count: 2.1k
rating: general
tags: hurt/comfort, future fic

my full piece for the @bakugoukatsukizine 💥

summary:

Katsuki’s hands closed into fists, and he punched the wall—once, twice. He barely registered the pain. Blinking against the droplets stuck to his lashes, Katsuki took a deep breath through his mouth. His eyes traced the first-degree burns littering his fingers, which he’d refused to get healing for. Marks of a hero, some would say. Proof that Katsuki tried his best, risking his life for others.

Only his best wasn’t enough, and while he was still alive, plenty of the ones he was meant to save weren’t.

READ IT ON AO3

blog.name: obito-is-love
blog.title: Obito Is Love
blog.description: An anime blog solely dedicated to my favorite art form! The majority of my posts are queued so that I don't spam the dashboard, as well as screenshots and music from my favorite osts that I've posted here. I like to capture my favorite moments from every episode I watch, hence the multiple screenshots per post. Apologies in advance for my obsessive tendencies! I tend to marathon shows.

title: Wonder Duo Interview
description:
by Shemtimeter

“Next we will have the two most popular heroes today! It is said that these two are like an invisible force when working, they are so in sync and work flawlessly! They are also rivalling in the number one spot! Not to mention, they outted themselves a few years ago. This is their first ever guesting in a show, so we are glad that they allowed us to do it! And now, we’ll find out more about them and their special someone.”

blog.name: litfi-safados
blog.title: Litfi
blog.description: BakuDeku Shipper | Amateur Writer | OC: Fiara Sasaki

summary: Smiles Brighter than Sunflowers - Litfi_Safados - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Arc
body:
Smiles Brighter than Sunflowers - Litfi_Safados - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Arc

This is my fic for @bakudekuflowerexchange dedicated to all BakuDeku fans.

Rating: General Audiences

Warning: No archive warnings apply

Relationship: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku

Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Aizawa Shouta

Additional Tags: Soulmate-Identifying Marks, Fluff and Angst, Alternatate Universe - Canon Divergence, Bakugou Katsuki is bad at feelings

Flower: Sunflower

Sunflowers symbolize adoration, loyalty and longevity. They are meant to be given as a gift to bring joy to others.

Prompts: Izuku’s admiration through the years.

I enjoyed working on this, even for as much as this piece wanted to fight with me the whole way through. Can’t wait to see/read everyone else’s work. Let the flowers fly!

blog.name: ellusquirk
blog.title: hi i'm ellie
blog.description: bnha, sds, khnm, opm | wattpad: elluspaghettu | requests: closed

summary: Matchup please? Female but questioning (prob genderfluid) biromantic ace. Long curly hair that I dye alot. Rn its purple. Hazel...
question: Matchup please? Female but questioning (prob genderfluid) biromantic ace. Long curly hair that I dye alot. Rn its purple. Hazel eyes, small and chubby. I've got depression, its v hard to get out of bed or do simple tasks, but once im motivated not much can stop me from doing what I need or want to. If i can make it with my hands I love it, Have an attitude, when Im annoyed Ill tell you, I have intrusive thoughts, and follow impulses, random cleaning sprees and sudden urges to paint on my walls.
answer:
i hope you can conquer your depression sweetheart! i’m on my journey of recovery right now, and its incredibly hard but very much worth it. things do get better! lots of love. sorry it’s a bit short so if you want me to add more remind me who you are and add some likes, dislikes, hobbies, dreams, goals etc! :)

✎ Eijirou Kirishima

  • eijirou’s the one for you!
  • the two of you often dye your hair together. it definitely involves a lot of messing around and a lot of mess in general, but its tonnes of fun. it’s definitely his favourite thing to do with you and he’ll often help you pick which colour you should dye your hair next. at least once he wants to be able to match with you, so will probably turn up one day with a box of red hair dye just innocently grinning at you.
  • he’s there to support you no matter what whilst you figure out how you identify and will definitely be there to listen to you whenever you have questions or need advice. he’ll try and learn as much as he can so he can help you, but respects the fact that its your own personal journey that you need to go on and will accept you no matter what.
  • he knows about your depression and damn this guy will do absolutely anything if it means you’ll smile. of course he’ll respect you whenever you need your space but of course he’s going to try and do anything he can to help you get out of bed and take care of yourself. he wants you to feel great about yourself and will help you maintain your self care. your self worth is incredibly important to him and he’ll do anything he can to help you. he’ll do whatever he can to see you smile too. he wants you happy and healthy and damn this boy will go the extra mile for you.
  • he admires the fact that you can intensely motivate yourself though, and he often feels really motivated after hanging out with you too. he always feels like he can do absolutely anything after hanging out with you and loves the energy that comes off of you. he definitely won’t stand in your way of something that you want to do and will make sure nothing obstructs your path too.
  • eijirou’s guilty pleasure is crafting things, so he’d be more than happy to do that with you. he can be a bit rough and clumsy, so it’ll take some time and patience, but he loves doing it with you. if it means he gets to be with you then he’ll definitely do it, and anytime you make something for yourself he definitely will keep it for forever. he treasures everything you make for him and will refuse to throw it away.
  • he loves your attitude, but only when he isn’t on the receiving end of it. whenever he sees you standing up for yourself or what you think is right then his heart swells with pride. he likes the fact that you’re blunt when you tell people if they’re annoying or have annoyed you - he believes honesty is the best policy and this definitely applies here!
  • he loves the impulsive cleaning session you have. he thinks its super cute and now he barely blinks his eye when he sees that your walls have changed colour. he’ll compliment your choice but no dwell on it much longer. he always feel super special whenever you ask for his opinion on a colour, and he’ll definitely help you with cleaning if you ask him to.

written on 01/05/19. requests: open. match ups: open.

PLEASE NOTE THAT THESE MATCH-UPS ARE JUST FOR FUN AND IF YOU DON’T LIKE THEM I’M SORRY! I TRY MY BEST AND PICK SOMEONE BASED ON WHAT I THINK AND IF YOU DON’T AGREE THAT’S FINE BUT NO HATE PLS <3 I TRY MY BEST!

reblog.comment:
i hope you can conquer your depression sweetheart! i’m on my journey of recovery right now, and its incredibly hard but very much worth it. things do get better! lots of love. sorry it’s a bit short so if you want me to add more remind me who you are and add some likes, dislikes, hobbies, dreams, goals etc! :)

✎ Eijirou Kirishima

  • eijirou’s the one for you!
  • the two of you often dye your hair together. it definitely involves a lot of messing around and a lot of mess in general, but its tonnes of fun. it’s definitely his favourite thing to do with you and he’ll often help you pick which colour you should dye your hair next. at least once he wants to be able to match with you, so will probably turn up one day with a box of red hair dye just innocently grinning at you.
  • he’s there to support you no matter what whilst you figure out how you identify and will definitely be there to listen to you whenever you have questions or need advice. he’ll try and learn as much as he can so he can help you, but respects the fact that its your own personal journey that you need to go on and will accept you no matter what.
  • he knows about your depression and damn this guy will do absolutely anything if it means you’ll smile. of course he’ll respect you whenever you need your space but of course he’s going to try and do anything he can to help you get out of bed and take care of yourself. he wants you to feel great about yourself and will help you maintain your self care. your self worth is incredibly important to him and he’ll do anything he can to help you. he’ll do whatever he can to see you smile too. he wants you happy and healthy and damn this boy will go the extra mile for you.
  • he admires the fact that you can intensely motivate yourself though, and he often feels really motivated after hanging out with you too. he always feels like he can do absolutely anything after hanging out with you and loves the energy that comes off of you. he definitely won’t stand in your way of something that you want to do and will make sure nothing obstructs your path too.
  • eijirou’s guilty pleasure is crafting things, so he’d be more than happy to do that with you. he can be a bit rough and clumsy, so it’ll take some time and patience, but he loves doing it with you. if it means he gets to be with you then he’ll definitely do it, and anytime you make something for yourself he definitely will keep it for forever. he treasures everything you make for him and will refuse to throw it away.
  • he loves your attitude, but only when he isn’t on the receiving end of it. whenever he sees you standing up for yourself or what you think is right then his heart swells with pride. he likes the fact that you’re blunt when you tell people if they’re annoying or have annoyed you - he believes honesty is the best policy and this definitely applies here!
  • he loves the impulsive cleaning session you have. he thinks its super cute and now he barely blinks his eye when he sees that your walls have changed colour. he’ll compliment your choice but no dwell on it much longer. he always feel super special whenever you ask for his opinion on a colour, and he’ll definitely help you with cleaning if you ask him to.

written on 01/05/19. requests: open. match ups: open.

title: Pre-Orders are now Closed!
body:
HOWEVER!

The Kittea tier will remain open, as it is only for the digital PDF copy and nothing physical needs to be shipped. If you’ve missed out on grabbing a copy, we’ll still have that available for a while!

You can grab the digital copy here!

Thank you to everyone for your support!
